name: Xelora Prime
desc: Xelora leads the Galactic Syndicate with a vision forged in the asteroid belts of Nebulon-5. With over 300 space cycles of interstellar strategy, she ensures the fleet is always one light-year ahead.

name: Zarnok Mech
desc: Zarnok is the tech brain behind our cosmic engines. A binary-native from the Cypher Quadrant, he's built scalable AI systems used in over 9 galaxies. Rumor says he dreams in code.
